GiveawayTimerAction(Giveaways, IGuild?, ITextChannel?)

Performs actions for a giveaway, such as selecting winners and notifying participants. Used for ending and rerolling giveaways.

Declaration
public Task GiveawayTimerAction(Giveaways r, IGuild? inputguild = null, ITextChannel? inputchannel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Giveaways r

The giveaway to perform actions for.
IGuild inputguild

The guild where the giveaway is being conducted.

GiveawaysInternal(ITextChannel, TimeSpan, string, int, ulong, ulong, ITextChannel, IGuild, string?, string?, string?, IDiscordInteraction?, string, IRole)

Initiates a giveaway with specified parameters.

Declaration
public Task GiveawaysInternal(ITextChannel chan, TimeSpan ts, string item, int winners, ulong host, ulong serverId, ITextChannel currentChannel, IGuild guild, string? reqroles = null, string? blacklistusers = null, string? blacklistroles = null, IDiscordInteraction? interaction = null, string banner = null, IRole pingROle = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel chan

The text channel where the giveaway will be initiated.
TimeSpan ts

The duration of the giveaway.
string item

The item or prize being given away.
int winners

The number of winners for the giveaway.
ulong host

The ID of the user hosting the giveaway.
ulong serverId

The ID of the server where the giveaway is being hosted.
ITextChannel currentChannel

The current text channel where the command is being executed.
IGuild guild

The guild where the giveaway is being initiated.
string reqroles

Optional: Roles required to enter the giveaway.
string blacklistusers

Optional: Users blacklisted from entering the giveaway.
string blacklistroles

Optional: Roles blacklisted from entering the giveaway.
IDiscordInteraction interaction

Optional: The Discord interaction related to the giveaway.
string banner

Optional: The URL of the banner for the giveaway.
IRole pingROle

Optional: The role to ping for the giveaway.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation.

OnReadyAsync()

Asynchronous method to handle the execution of the giveaway loop when the bot is ready. This method continuously checks for active giveaways and processes them.

Declaration
public Task OnReadyAsync()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation.
